adjective &amp; adverb.description: In a westward position or direction.
examples: the westerly end of Sunset Boulevard
our plan was to keep westerly

noun.description: A wind blowing from the west.

proper noun.description: An industrial and resort town in southwestern Rhode Island, on the Connecticut border; population 23,377 (est. 2008).

origin: Late 15th century: from obsolete wester western + -ly.
